title: Deebo’s Trade Request and Best Draft Fits
description:
Kevin, Nora, and Steven react to the news of Deebo Samuel’s trade request, Denzel Ward’s extension, and the Carolina Panthers fiasco. The trio later picks the landing spots for the draft prospects for the 2022 NFL draft.

Host: Kevin Clark, Nora Princiotti, and Steven Ruiz
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
